body_html:
Hum, we actually have kernels for Conv1d working on NxWxC, but we have decided to simplify the interface.
I can't speak for NLP use-cases, but I'd vote for keeping a single data layout for 2d convolutions, as NCHW is going to be much faster thanks to better cudnn support , and adding a new data layout will just make using the library more complex and error prone.

body:
Hum, we actually have kernels for Conv1d working on `NxWxC`, but we have decided to simplify the interface.
I can't speak for NLP use-cases, but I'd vote for keeping a single data layout for 2d convolutions, as `NCHW` is going to be much faster thanks to better cudnn support , and adding a new data layout will just make using the library more complex and error prone.
